name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/lgb_7309_poky_little_puppy
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: The Poky Little Puppy (A Little Golden Book Classic)
description: Follow the adventures of a curious little puppy who digs holes under the fence and doesn't get any strawberry shortcake! The Poky Little Puppy is one of the original twelve Little Golden Books and is the best-selling picture book of all time. A perfect story for young readers.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/lgb_8821_monster_at_the_end
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: The Monster at the End of This Book (A Sesame Street Little Golden Book)
description: Lovable, furry old Grover is terrified to learn that there’s a monster at the end of this book! He begs readers not to turn the pages, but of course, kids feel they just have to. A suspenseful and hilarious classic that generations have enjoyed.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/lgb_2938_paw_patrol_puppy_power

description: Join Chase, Marshall, Skye, and the rest of the heroic PAW Patrol pups on an exciting adventure! This Little Golden Book is perfect for boys and girls ages 2 to 5 who love Nickelodeon's PAW Patrol.

title: Scuffy the Tugboat (A Little Golden Book Classic)
description: Scuffy the Tugboat is meant for bigger things than a bathtub. He sets off to explore the world, but soon finds the sea is a very big place! This timeless tale of a brave little tugboat is a beloved classic.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/0/products/lgb_3345_i_am_a_bunny
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: I Am a Bunny (A Beloved Little Golden Book)
description: Nicholas, a bunny, takes the reader through the seasons, showcasing beautiful illustrations of nature and wildlife. This simple, gentle story by Richard Scarry has been a favorite for generations.

title: Tawny Scrawny Lion (A Little Golden Book Classic)
description: Once there was a tawny, scrawny, hungry lion who never got enough to eat! Follow the charming tale of how a clever little rabbit teaches the lion to love carrot stew, saving all the other animals.

title: The Saggy Baggy Elephant (A Little Golden Book Classic)
description: After a parrot makes fun of his big ears and saggy skin, Sooki the elephant isn't sure of himself. This classic story teaches a timeless lesson about self-love and acceptance.

title: The Little Red Hen (A Little Golden Book)
description: The classic story of the industrious hen who does all the work to make a delicious cake, while the other lazy farm animals refuse to help. A timeless fable about teamwork and consequences, beautifully illustrated.

description: Lovable, furry old Grover is terrified to learn that there is a monster at the end of this book! He begs readers not to turn the pages, but of course, kids will keep going, leading to a hilarious and surprising conclusion. An interactive classic.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_LGB_030702134X
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: The Poky Little Puppy (A Little Golden Book Classic)
description: One of the original twelve Little Golden Books, The Poky Little Puppy has sold nearly 15 million copies since 1942, making it one of the most popular children’s books of all time. This classic tale of a mischievous puppy who has to go to bed without any strawberry shortcake is a favorite of families everywhere.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_LGB_0307020464
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: Scuffy the Tugboat (A Little Golden Book Classic)
description: Scuffy is a toy tugboat who yearns for a life beyond the toy store bathtub. He sets off on a grand adventure down a small stream, which turns into a river, and finally leads him to the vast sea. But Scuffy soon learns that home is the best place to be.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_LGB_0307960352
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: Tootle (A Little Golden Book Classic)
description: Tootle is a young locomotive who loves to chase butterflies and play in the meadow. Can he learn the important rules of the rails—'Always Stay on the Track No Matter What!'—and grow up to be a real streamliner? This charming story has been a favorite for generations.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_LGB_0375836268
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: The Shy Little Kitten (A Little Golden Book Classic)
description: Follow a shy little kitten on an adventure with her animal friends. This heartwarming story, with its lush illustrations by Gustaf Tenggren, has been a family favorite for over 70 years.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_LGB_0736435933
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: Marvel's Spider-Man: The Story of Spider-Man (A Marvel Little Golden Book)
description: Swing into action with Spider-Man! Boys and girls ages 2 to 5 will love learning all about this amazing hero’s webslinging powers and his awesome friends. This Little Golden Book is the perfect introduction to the world of Marvel superheroes.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_LGB_0375861114
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: I Am a Bunny (A Beloved Little Golden Book)
description: A classic for a reason, this beautifully illustrated book follows a bunny named Nicholas through the four seasons. The simple text by Ole Risom and stunning artwork by Richard Scarry make this a perfect book for the youngest readers.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_LGB_030702110X
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: The Saggy Baggy Elephant (A Little Golden Book Classic)
description: Sooki the elephant is happy just the way he is, until a parrot makes him self-conscious about his saggy, baggy skin. Sooki goes on a journey and discovers he's not alone, and learns to love his unique features. A classic tale of self-acceptance.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/TRU_LGB_0736434880
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: Star Wars: I Am a Jedi (A Star Wars Little Golden Book)
description: Meet Luke Skywalker, a young boy from a desert planet who grows up to be a powerful Jedi Knight! This book introduces the youngest Star Wars fans to the brave heroes, fearsome villains, and amazing worlds of the classic trilogy in the beloved Little Golden Book style.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/84102001
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: The Poky Little Puppy (A Little Golden Book Classic)
brands: Random House Books for Young Readers
description: One of the original twelve Little Golden Books, 'The Poky Little Puppy' is a timeless classic. Follow the adventures of a curious puppy who digs his way to freedom, only to miss out on dessert! This beloved story, with its iconic illustrations, has captivated generations of readers.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/84102002
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: The Monster at the End of This Book (A Sesame Street Little Golden Book)
description: Lovable, furry old Grover is distressed to learn that there's a monster at the end of this book! He begs readers not to turn the pages, but of course, kids can't resist. This interactive classic teaches children about facing their fears, with a hilarious and surprising twist at the end.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/84102003
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: Star Wars: I Am a Jedi (A Star Wars Little Golden Book)
description: Meet Luke Skywalker, a farm boy from Tatooine who becomes one of the greatest Jedi in the galaxy! This Little Golden Book retells the story of Luke's epic journey from the original Star Wars trilogy, introducing young readers to the Force, droids, and the fight against the evil Empire.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/84102004
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: Scuffy the Tugboat (A Little Golden Book Classic)
brands: Random House Books for Young Readers
description: Scuffy is a toy tugboat who was 'meant for bigger things' than sailing in a bathtub. Join Scuffy on his grand adventure as he sails down a small brook, into a river, and finally out to the vast sea. This charming story about adventure and finding your place is a perennial favorite.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/84102005
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: Barbie: The Big Splash (A Barbie Little Golden Book)
description: It's the day of the big pool party, and Barbie and her little sister Chelsea are excited to take a swim! But when they discover that their new pool hasn't been filled with water yet, can they work together to save the party? A fun, sunny story about teamwork and problem-solving.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/84102006
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: The Little Red Hen (A Little Golden Book)
description: The classic fable of 'The Little Red Hen' comes to life with vibrant illustrations. This story teaches children a valuable lesson about the rewards of hard work and cooperation. When the hen finds a grain of wheat, will any of her lazy friends help her plant, harvest, or bake it into bread?

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/84102007
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: Marvel's Spider-Man: The Story of Spider-Man (A Marvel Little Golden Book)
description: Swing into action with Spider-Man! This Little Golden Book introduces young readers to the friendly neighborhood hero, Peter Parker. Learn how he got his amazing spider-powers and became the amazing Spider-Man, all in a kid-friendly format with dynamic illustrations.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/84102008
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: Home for a Bunny (A Little Golden Book Classic)
brands: Random House Books for Young Readers
description: A gentle, poetic story about a bunny's search for a home in the springtime. Illustrated by the legendary Garth Williams, this book beautifully captures the essence of spring as the bunny meets robins, frogs, and groundhogs on his journey. A perfect book for Easter or any day of the year.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/84102009
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: Tootle (A Little Golden Book Classic)
brands: Random House Books for Young Readers
description: Tootle is a young locomotive who loves to play in the meadows more than staying on the tracks. Can he learn the rules of being a good engine and still have fun? This classic tale by Gertrude Crampton, with iconic illustrations by Tibor Gergely, teaches the importance of being true to yourself while still following the rules.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/84102010
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: The Saggy Baggy Elephant (A Little Golden Book Classic)
description: Sooki the elephant is happy just the way he is, until a parrot makes fun of his big ears and wrinkly skin. Feeling down, Sooki goes on a journey of self-discovery, only to find a whole herd of elephants who look just like him! A heartwarming tale about self-acceptance and belonging.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/toysrus_lgb_9780307960232
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: The Poky Little Puppy (A Little Golden Book Classic)
brands: Random House Books for Young Readers
description: One of the original twelve Little Golden Books, The Poky Little Puppy is the story of a curious puppy who digs holes under the fence and has to go to bed without any strawberry shortcake. For over 75 years, this story has been a favorite of families and is the bestselling picture book of all time.

description: Swing into the action with Spider-Man! Boys and girls ages 2 to 5 will love this action-packed Little Golden Book as they learn about the web-slinger's amazing powers and his thrilling adventures.

description: Meet Luke Skywalker, a Jedi in training, and follow his epic journey from a farm boy on Tatooine to a hero of the Rebellion. This beautifully illustrated Little Golden Book is perfect for Star Wars fans of all ages.

title: Cinderella (A Disney Little Golden Book)
description: The classic fairy tale of Cinderella is retold in the timeless Little Golden Book format. With the help of her fairy godmother and some animal friends, Cinderella's dreams of going to the royal ball come true.

brands: Random House Books for Young Readers
description: Climb into the driver's seat and hit the road with Richard Scarry's fast and funny cars and trucks! This Little Golden Book is a delightful and action-packed introduction to the many vehicles that populate Busytown.

name: projects/toysrus/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/toysrus_lgb_9780375826229
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: The Little Engine That Could (A Little Golden Book)
description: The timeless story of the little blue engine who wasn't afraid to try, now in the classic Little Golden Book format! The inspirational tale of the train filled with toys and gifts for little boys and girls that breaks down before reaching the children. After all the big engines refuse to help, the Little Blue Engine comes to the rescue with her mantra, 'I think I can, I think I can.'

title: Barbie: The Big Splash (A Barbie Little Golden Book)
description: Children ages 2 to 5 will love to read about Barbie as she helps her friend Skipper get over her fear of the water and learn to swim. This beautifully illustrated Little Golden Book is a timeless Barbie story!

name: projects/toysrus-retail/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/tr_lgb_006_paw_patrol
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: PAW Patrol: Puppy Power! (A PAW Patrol Little Golden Book)
description: No job is too big, no pup is too small! Join Chase, Marshall, Skye, and the rest of the PAW Patrol in this action-packed Little Golden Book. It's the perfect gift for boys and girls ages 2 to 5.

categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: Richard Scarry's Cars and Trucks (A Richard Scarry Little Golden Book)
description: Hit the road with this busy Little Golden Book about all kinds of cars and trucks! With classic, humorous illustrations by Richard Scarry, young readers will love discovering all the different vehicles, from the fanciest sports cars to the busiest dump trucks.

name: projects/toysrus-retail/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/tr_lgb_008_spiderman
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: Marvel's Spider-Man: The Story of Spider-Man (A Marvel Little Golden Book)
description: Your friendly neighborhood Spider-Man swings into the world of Little Golden Books! Follow the classic origin story of Peter Parker, from a nerdy high school student to the amazing Spider-Man after being bitten by a radioactive spider.

name: projects/toysrus-retail/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/tr_lgb_009_home_bunny
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: Home for a Bunny (A Little Golden Book Classic)
description: In this classic, a little bunny goes searching for a home, meeting other animals along the way. Garth Williams's soft, endearing illustrations and Margaret Wise Brown's gentle, poetic words make this a perfect springtime or Easter story.

name: projects/toysrus-retail/locations/global/catalogs/default_catalog/branches/default_branch/products/tr_lgb_010_red_caboose
categories: Books > Children's Books > Book Series > Little Golden Books
title: The Little Red Caboose (A Little Golden Book Classic)
description: The little red caboose was sad. He was always at the back of the train and never got to see what was ahead. But one day, the little red caboose got his chance to be a hero! A timeless tale about being happy with who you are.
